text: Gruss may refer to: * 6516 Gruss, a main-belt asteroid * Olaf Gruss, a botanist * Peter Gruss (born 1949), a German developmental biologist * Shoshanna Lonstein Gruss (born 1975), an American fashion designer * Robert Dwayne Gruss (born 1955), a bishop of the Catholic Church in the United States == See also == * Grüss Gott, literally, "God greet you", a German greeting * Hitlergruss, the Nazi salute * Grus (disambiguation)
title: Gruss
